TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TimeSpanMinutesOrInfiniteConverter extends System.Configuration.TimeSpanMinutesConverter
Public NotInheritable Class TimeSpanMinutesOrInfiniteConverter Inherits TimeSpanMinutesConverter

Docs.summary: Converts a expressed in minutes or as a standard infinite time span.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This type, like all the other configuration converter types, converts strings found in the configuration file to and from the related strongly typed properties.
In particular, the <xref:System.Configuration.TimeSpanMinutesOrInfiniteConverter> class converts <xref:System.String> minutes, assigned to a configuration property, to <xref:System.TimeSpan> minutes and vice versa. If the configuration property has a <xref:System.String> value of "infinite", it converts this value to <xref:System.TimeSpan.MaxValue> and vice versa.
The infinite <xref:System.TimeSpan> value is represented by the <xref:System.TimeSpan.MaxValue> enumeration value.
## Examples Refer to the code examples in the <xref:System.Configuration.InfiniteTimeSpanConverter> and <xref:System.Configuration.TimeSpanMinutesConverter> classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Normally, you use the converter types provided by the system. The only time you need to use the <xref:System.Configuration.TimeSpanMinutesOrInfiniteConverter.%23ctor%2A> constructor is when you create your own conversion type.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The system uses the <xref:System.Configuration.TimeSpanMinutesOrInfiniteConverter.ConvertFrom%2A> method when reading from a configuration file to convert a <xref:System.String> value to <xref:System.TimeSpan>, or the <xref:System.String> "infinite" to <xref:System.TimeSpan.MaxValue>.
## Examples Refer to the code examples in the <xref:System.Configuration.InfiniteTimeSpanConverter> and <xref:System.Configuration.TimeSpanMinutesConverter> classes.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The system uses the <xref:System.Configuration.TimeSpanMinutesOrInfiniteConverter.ConvertTo%2A> method when writing to a configuration file to convert a <xref:System.TimeSpan> value or <xref:System.TimeSpan.MaxValue> to a <xref:System.String>.
## Examples Refer to the code examples in the <xref:System.Configuration.InfiniteTimeSpanConverter> and <xref:System.Configuration.TimeSpanMinutesConverter> classes.
